title: Rescuers in Morocco race to save Rayan, boy trapped in well
content:
1. Rescuers in Morocco race to save Rayan, boy trapped in well  NBC News
  2. Little boy in northern Morocco is stuck in a well: Is there hope for him?  Fox News
  3. Rescue Operation to Save 5-Year-Old Boy has Transfixed Morocco  The New York Times
  4. Moroccan rescuers edge closer to child trapped in well  Reuters
  5. Effort to rescue Moroccan boy stuck in well reaches 'final stages'  New York Post
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
